addChild(string,address,address,uint256).details: Child is added to parentToChildMapping and the parent is added to the childToParentMapping as bidirectional relationship.

params._baseAmount: Base amount of allowance (claimableAmount will be determined based on this).
params._tokenPreference: Address of the child's prefered token.

calculateClaimableAmount(uint256,uint8).details: Calculates the child's claimable amount based on their baseAmount: daily = -10%, weekly = base, monthly = +10%.

claim(address).details: If the child's claim moment has ben reached it's able to claim, the next claim moment will be set based on the child's claimPeriod.

params._tokenToBeClaimed: Address of the token which will be claimed (should be the child's prefered token).

createNewToken(uint256,string,string).details: Mints new tokens with the TokenCreator contract and stores them in current contract, maps the token to the msg.sender.

params._supply: Total supply of the minted token.

returns._0: nextClaimPeriod the child's next available claim time.
returns._1: claimPeriod The child's selected claimPeriod (daily, weekly, monthly).

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token which the child would like to receive for allowance.

childToParentMapping.details: Used as a bidirectional datastructure together with parentToChildMapping.

addChild(string,address,address,uint256).notice: Parent function: Function for parent to add a new child.

childToParentMapping(address).notice: Mapping of a child address to a parent address.

claim(address).notice: Child Function: Function for child to claim their allowance.

getChildsNextClaimPeriod().notice: Gets the next claim moment and claim period of the child who called this function.

getChildsParent().notice: Child Function: Gets the parent address of the msg.sender.

getCurrentTime().notice: Gets the current UNIX time from chain.

getERC20Balance(address).notice: Helper function used to get the balance of an ERC20 token.

parentToChildMappingNested(address,addre.notice: Nested mapping of a parent address mapped to a mapping of a child address to a child struct.

parentToTokensMapping(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of parent addresses to the tokens they have minted with the TokenCreator contract.

setChildClaimMomentDaily().notice: Child Function: Sets the child's claimPeriod to daily, by calling this function the nextClaimPeriod and claimableAmount will be set according to the claimPeriod.

setChildClaimMomentMonthly().notice: Child Function: Sets the child's claimPeriod to Monthly, by calling this function the nextClaimPeriod and claimableAmount will be set according to the claimPeriod.

setChildClaimMomentWeekly().notice: Child Function: Sets the child's claimPeriod to weekly, by calling this function the nextClaimPeriod and claimableAmount will be set according to the claimPeriod.

setChildTokenPreference(address).notice: Child Function: Sets the child's prefered token for allowance.

userdoc.notice: A decentralized platform for parents to teach their children about cryptocurrencies.
